preferredHost.$comment_enablePH: default value is true when connectListIndex value is defined

connectionList.$comment_encryptedConnType: Currently only value 0 (SOCKET) is possible; present for future compatibility
connectionList.$comment_encryptionProtocolFlags: 4 - TLSv1_2, 8 - TLSv1_3, 12 - both TLSv1_2 and TLSv1_3; default value is unspecified - determined and negotiated by underyling system

$comment_connectionList: At least one element is required
